title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Launcher After Projectiles Target Western Galilee”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

In a quick closing of the loop; the IDF attacked the launcher from which the projectiles directed at the western Galilee were identified.

Following the alerts that were activated at 21:44 in the western Galilee area, several projectiles were identified crossing from Lebanon, some were intercepted and the rest fell in open areas, with no casualties.

In a quick closing of the loop, air force fighter jets attacked the launcher of the Hezbollah terrorist organization from which the projectiles were identified in the Yater area in southern Lebanon.

Earlier today, the IDF fired artillery to remove the threat in the Ramish and Ramiah areas in southern Lebanon.

Attached is documentation from the attack on the launcher: https://bit.ly/3LOTJV7
